snippet.title: Haunted House - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Haunted House is a casual rogue-lite adventure game reimagined from the classic title developed by Orbit Studios. The game features modernized mechanics such as rogue-lite elements and stealth-based gameplay coupled with procedurally generated mansion rooms making every play session fresh and new. Haunted House is launching in 2023 for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, Nintendo Switch, Atari VCS, and PC.
